storyInfo: Amiya's team arrives at the port, but they encounter a Sarkaz patrol searching people trying to leave the city. The guide flees in a panic, and runs straight into Dublinn soldiers led by Mandragora.

attributes.content: 9:09 A.M. \ Overcast
Port 309, Sudean Borough, Londinium
The port... is right ahead.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Hm... Actually, things have been going pretty well so far...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: With one exception.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, the Messenger who's been in contact with you and Dr. Kal'tsit should've reached out to us as soon as we arrived at the adjacent plate.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: I remember that arrangement.;......;Think something happened to her?

attributes.content: We're just waiting here... with our hands tied behind our backs.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I thought we'd be able to see her in person, or at least get some kind of message.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, I can't say any more about our current situation to the other operators.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've already gotten this far, so we can only keep moving forward.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If we can't get in touch, we can't know for sure.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But I can only hope that nothing happened to her...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We'll enter the city as we originally planned.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ugh, look at how long that line is. They're all coming from the direction of the city...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We're really going to run away like this?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: This way's safe. My neighbor's whole family left this way last week.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: As long as we've applied for an exit permit, the soldiers won't give us any trouble.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: That... That's not what I meant.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: I know. We're thinking the same thing.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: Four years ago was when I first heard about the Sarkaz army on the news. Didn't think much of it back then.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: Yeah, same here. With Her Majesty gone, everything's turned to shit. Who could've expected that some duke would invite the devils into the army on a whim?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: Two years ago, I saw Sarkaz troops walking down the streets of Trenfield. Everyone was talking about it as we walked home from work.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: I also remember... It was as if things quietly changed overnight. Those of us who lived by the duke's estate in Camden wouldn't see these changes until a bit later.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: Something like half a year ago, the Sarkaz army stood in front of our bank. They took away our manager because her husband held an important position in the city's defense forces.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: Whew. Did you ever see them again? The police force in our estate was replaced with all new faces, plenty with horrible horns on top.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: And then there's... yesterday. I saw the Sarkaz going to the corner opposite my home. They were... knocking on doors.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: So that's why you decided to flee?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: Actually, my parents left a long time ago. I just... couldn't put down my banker's salary.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: None of us wanted this. Londinium... If we leave, we'll never be able to go back to our old lives, right?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: Let's not worry about that for now. We should get going. I'd rather stay alive than make money.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: Is it like this every day?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: More or less, since a certain point.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Theresis's army... They're not stopping the civilians from leaving the city?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: By the looks of things, he doesn't seem to care about letting outsiders know who holds the reins of power in Londinium now.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.options: And the other nobles don't care?;What's going on in Parliament?

attributes.content: I'd assume they always have an eye on Londinium, which is why they have troops stationed outside the city.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: But they're more concerned about watching each others' moves.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: For the dukes who've been trying to get into Londinium, whoever gets ahead in taking down the Sarkaz inside the city will gain the upper hand in this power struggle that has lasted over twenty years.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Who would want to see the throne claimed by someone else, when in their minds, it rightfully belongs to them?
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: The way things are now, anything a duke might pull can be stopped by a few messages, an invitation to a party, or even a little bad news from their own demesne.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And even if one of them decided to march on the city, they'd be walking right into a defeat. The Sarkaz regent wouldn't lose a single man.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: I'm not sure.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: When we left Londinium, the city seemed like it did on any ordinary day.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: And I always figured that if Parliament could convene for a day, nothing too crazy could happen to Londinium.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: As for the specifics of what's going on inside the city, we won't know until we see for ourselves.
attributes.name: Siege

attributes.content: Excuse me, I've brought you all the way here... You'll be able to go the rest of the way on your own, right?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Yes, sure. Thank you, Mr. Thomas. You've done us a great favor.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: All squads, listen up. Follow the plan and mingle with the flow of traffic ahead in batches––
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Closure's squad will go first to make sure the road ahead of us is clear. Then Siege's squad will follow up, with me and Doctor's squad behind that.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Recon squad, keep a close eye on our surroundings, and report any abnormalities right away.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Balin, you'll be in charge of taking Mr. Thomas back the same way we came.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: There's a disturbance up ahead! Looks like Sarkaz fighters incoming!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Everyone, the infiltration operation is on hold. Take cover, hide yourselves!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Grab that one, right there!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What... What's going on? Why are the Sarkaz here?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: Didn't you say this way was safe?!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: I'm talking to you. Stop right there!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hurry... Hurry... We're almost out... of the city...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: Gaaahh––!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen A

attributes.content: Wrong one.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: S-Sir, please... D-Don't hurt me, I'll go... Did we do something wrong?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen B

attributes.content: Go, scurry off. Don't stand here blocking our way.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Listen up, nobody move!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Stop what you're doing and stand still. You, you, and you. Turn around and let me see your face!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What's in your bag? Is it a weapon? Pour everything out and let me see!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Why's there a burn mark on your face? Looks pretty fresh too... Yeah, you. Get out of the line!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You burned your face baking bread? Do you take us for fools?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Hmph... Guess it really wasn't our weapons. Just to be sure, you're not a rebel, right?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Got too scared and passed out, huh? Whatever, we'll bring this one with us.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Lieutenant, we're stuck here.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: It's my fault. Before I brought you here, I should've made sure we weren't being followed.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Please don't talk like that.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: We've all been through worse. Whether it's my bunch that got captured by Dublinn, or Old Tom's group who were tortured by the Sarkaz, we were pretty much dead men walking until you rescued us.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: That really was a taste of despair... I'd rather die in battle than live inside the enemy's cage, powerless and addled.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: You are not to blame for Londinium's fall, not in the slightest.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: And you are even less to blame.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: You were the one who pulled us out of a desperate situation. At least I was able to get here on my own two legs, and got to live an extra hour.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: I said I didn't have the will to fight anymore, but you didn't blame me. You even risked yourself to bring us here.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Leave us, Lieutenant. If you're alone, you can hide. Avoid their line of sight, and find a safe place.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: We're sickly and chewed up. We'll only slow you down.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: I'd never leave any of you behind.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hah... If our officers back there were like you, then maybe... we wouldn't have lost so quickly and disastrously.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: It took meeting you to make me realize that I wanted to make a difference, to be like you...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: You mean... No, you mustn't!
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Hey, if the few of us charged at once, how many Sarkaz do you reckon we could take with us?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Listen to me, right now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: None of you move. That's an order.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: An order...?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Fine. You're my commanding officer right now. I'll obey your orders.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: We still have a few minutes until we face the Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Keep your heads down. Remember what I told you – you're all vagrants from the neighboring estate. You got hurt fighting each other over a piece of bread.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: You... expect the Sarkaz to buy that?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Sudean is a complete mess these days. They've probably seen it all.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Doesn't matter if they buy it or not. Even if they try to interrogate you, just... bear with it for a while.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: And if you can't take it anymore...
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: We understand. If the Sarkaz find out, no one betrays the others.
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: If you can't take it anymore, that's when I'll make my move.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Lieutenant...?!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen?

attributes.content: Let's wait and see for now.
attributes.name: Horn

attributes.content: Nothing over here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: What about over there? There are a few more over there, and behind that elevator too. This damned place has too many hiding spots!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: You lot, go take a closer look over there!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Warrior

attributes.content: Those fighters seem to be looking for someone.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Squads, report your current position.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Positions confirmed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: They don't seem to be after us.;Think we haven't been made yet.

attributes.content: Seems like it.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Doctor, do you still remember the table-top exercise we did with Dr. Kal'tsit before we left?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: One possibility is that the Messengers we had active around Londinium and Victoria all failed.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: They didn't have time to provide us with the accurate intel, and Theresis was able to see all our moves.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: In that case, Theresis's personal guard would be there waiting for us the moment we set foot in Londinium.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But it doesn't look like that's what's happening...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Actually, I thought it'd be a Confessarius.;......;Surely we wouldn't be that incompetent?

attributes.content: I think we've more or less reached the same conclusion.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Theresis doesn't know we're here yet. Otherwise, we would've had a very hard time even making it this far.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: If that's true, then these Sarkaz fighters up ahead must be searching for someone else who could potentially come this way...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Huh, Mr. Thomas...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Amiya, he tried to bolt! I barely managed to stop him!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: No, let me go! I can't stay here...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Mr. Thomas, you'd best not run off on your own! That'd be terribly dangerous!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I promised you I'd send an operator to escort you... I'm really sorry, but that's not something we can do right now...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ouch!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: W-Wait, you can't just take our operator's weapon––!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry, b-but, I don't want to die!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: What's going on here...?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: It's pretty obvious.;He thinks the Sarkaz are after him.

attributes.content: I don't want this either... I was just their driver for six months, that's all!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: They took over my candy plant and forced me to ship things for them. I have a family... what am I supposed to do?!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: That day I took a tiny peek, just one glance. How could I have known what they were doing with my plant?
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: They've been chasing me ever since! If they catch me, they're going to kill me for sure!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Why'd you have me do this anyway... I'm going to die, no matter where I run!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: I... I can't just sit here and wait to die...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Mr. Thomas!
attributes.name: Rhodes Island Operator

attributes.content: Balin! Don't chase after him, we can't afford to blow our cover.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Ha... Haha...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: I'll just... keep running away from Londinium... I don't even care about Dublinn anymore...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: Huh?
Eek––!
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: You... How could... You're...
attributes.name: Londinium Citizen

attributes.content: It's not up to you to decide whether or not you care about Dublinn.
attributes.name: Mandragora

attributes.content: ––Get him.
attributes.name: Mandragora
